advancements.goety_revelation.apocalypti: Obtain the Apocalyptium Ingot,the ultimate upgraded version of the dark metal ingot.
Obtain a full set of divine - metal armors.
advancements.goety_revelation.broken.des: Obtain the Broken Halo, a godhood left behind from the Apostle.
advancements.goety_revelation.defeat_apo: Defeat incarnation of Apollyon, the Lord of wrecked nether.
advancements.goety_revelation.doom.descr: Obtain the Medal of Doom, An item that bears destruction...
advancements.goety_revelation.doom.title: Emblem of Doomsday
advancements.goety_revelation.end.descri: Reveal the ultimate secret and ascend to the divine realm.
advancements.goety_revelation.end.title: End Deity
advancements.goety_revelation.hammer.des: Upgrade your forging hammer with various expensive materials to master the true ancient forging techniques.
advancements.goety_revelation.quietus_st: Obtain the Quietus star, the origin of the withering of life.
advancements.goety_revelation.revelation: I am the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End. (Revelation 22:13)
advancements.goety_revelation.servant_ki: Banish the gods from the hands of servants.
advancements.goety_revelation.summon_apo: And in those days shall men seek death, and shall not find it; and shall desire to die, and death shall flee from them. (Revelation 9:6)
advancements.goety_revelation.the_tip_of: 「So when Jesus had taken the wine he said, All is done. And with his head bent he gave up his spirit.(The Book of John19：30)
advancements.goety_revelation.time.descr: Obtain the Eternal Pocket Watch and make the world stand still for an instant by your will.
advancements.goety_revelation.time.title: Moment into Eternity
advancements.goety_revelation.will.descr: Obtain the Dimensional Will, and all creatures will kneel at your feet.
advancements.goety_revelation.will.title: Three Dimension into One
block.tetra.hammer_base.guide:
To upgrade a Tetra hammer into a §8Dark Ingot Forge Hammer§r:
1.Requirements
  - Off-hand: Hold the seven upgrade materials in order(top-to-bottom as shown in JEI's right panel).

  - Main hand: Hold a Tetra hammer of Cany tier.

2.Crafting Process

  - Right-click the Hammer block with the setup above.

  - Success indicator:

    - A sound effect plays , and one material is consumed from your off-hand.

    - Repeat until all seven materials are forged into the hammer.

3.Completion

  - When fully upgraded, the hammer will emit continuous particle effects, confirming the creation of the Dark Ingot Hammer.

death.attack.revelationfix.fe_power.1: Under the influence of %s, %s never exist.
death.attack.revelationfix.fe_power.2: Under the influence of %s, %s was torn apart into fragments of reality.
enchantment.goety_revelation.reality_pie: Reduces the invulnerability frames of attacked entities by 0.1 seconds per level.(includes "Apollyon")
item.goety_revelation.blessing_scroll.de: §6These traits are multiplied by total amount of
"From then on, raise the bows to carry out the Crusade."
item.goety_revelation.curios_storage_cry: §55Hold §6Shift§5 right click on the ground to extract te curios.
item.goety_revelation.dimensional_will.d: "We give thanks to you, Lord God Almighty, who is and who was,"
"for you have taken your great power and begun to reign."
item.goety_revelation.dimensional_will.r: §5A things that should not exist formed by condensing the power of dimensions.
§5And provides §6%s%% §dChance§5 that otherwise lethal damage won't kill you.
item.goety_revelation.eternal_watch.desc: "They will not need the light of a lamp or the light of the sun,"
"for the Lord God will give them light."
"And they will reign for ever and ever."
item.goety_revelation.eternal_watch.real: §5Freezes time in the entire dimension for §6%s §5seconds.
§5The wielder of this accessory, if attacking any entity while the dimension is frozen,
§5This attack will immediately end the dimension's time freeze.
item.goety_revelation.ice_focus.info: Unleash the Frigid Domain - freeze all who dare approach.
item.goety_revelation.quietus_star.guide:
Quietus star, the origin of the withering of life.
2.5% chance to drop this item by killing the WitherBoss
item.goety_revelation.revelation_focus.i: Use the power of Seven Seals, unfold the purgatory barrier, and burn the souls that dare to usurp the lord.
item.goety_revelation.the_needle.desc0: §5The Needle will give you the ability to §dpenetrate armor and enchantments§5.
item.goety_revelation.the_needle.real_de: §5Hold right-click to charge §61s§5, then release to impale yourself and make yourself more powerful.
§5After use, will choose one of the attributes §d%s, %s, %s, %s §5and permanently increase the player's attribute value.
§5After using §6%s §5times, The Needle will §4lost this ability.
item.goety_revelation.the_needle.tail0: §8§o"And it was commanded them that they should not hurt the grass of the earth, neither any green thing, neither any tree;"
item.goety_revelation.the_needle.tail1: §8§o"but only those men which have not the seal of God in their foreheads."
item.goety_revelation.the_tip_of_the_aeg: Tip of the Spear of Aeglos
item.goety_revelation.the_tip_of_the_lon: Tip of the Spear of Longinus

Kill a villager named "Jesus" using a tetra single head tool equipped with a spearhead.
Then break the handheld item to liberate the Spear of Longinus.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip1: §6§oThe Sacred Halo§r§5§o symbolizes the elevation of life,
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip10: §4§l§oYou§r§7§o, for the §r§b§osouls§r§7§o of all, care and protect,
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip10.ability: §8§oWither skull will transform into more destructive Nether Meteor.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip11: §7§oWe chant §4§l§oYour§r§7§o name in the eternal darkness, so the light never went out.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip12: §7§oUntil the Light enlightens §c§ous§r§7§o once more, §c§oWe§r§7§o shall spread §6§othe legend of Holy Fire§r§7§o in eternal darkness.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip13: Even it is broken and tarnished, it may still protect you from some damage.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip13.ability: §8§oPotion effects will no longer affect you.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip14.ability: §8§oSoul cost of focuses will be reduced to an unimaginable level.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip15.ability: §8§oYou will cast spells at an extraordinary speed.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip16.ability: §8§oIn §4Nether§r§8§o, you will have 50% damage resistance, and in §2Overworld§r§8§o, you will have 25% damage resistance.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip17.ability: §8§o§lYou have the defenses of those pale-faced envoys in the Nether.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip18.ability: §4§o§lWhen you die, you will be instantly healed to 50% of your health, be invincible for 30 seconds, while summoning Wither Servant at the same time, and the weather will be locked to thunderstorm with Nether Meteors raining down.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip19.ability: §4§o§lThis effect lasts for 300 seconds and has a cooldown of 1800 seconds.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip2: §5§oOn selection, Regardless of status or rank, neither the noble nor the lowly, the poor nor the wealthy, will be blessed by His grace, one can bear the §c§oapostolic§r§5§o mission.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip2.ability: §8§oFireball/Lava Bomb Focus will burn the enemies' souls.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip3: §0§kNow I claim your place, your talents to pursue.&r
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip3.ability: §8§oHail Focus will turn into a lava fire rain and track the enemies.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip4: §4§L§oHe§r§5§o speaks §4'I am the shepherd who light shine out of darkness.'
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip5.ability: §8§oUpdraft Focus will summon fire blast from Nether.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip6.ability: §8§oCyclone Focus will be amplified by fire.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip7: §5§oHave a new companion joined, to follow §4§L§oHis§r§5§o behests accordingly.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip7.ability: §8§oRotting Focus will always summon the most elite soldiers.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip8: §5§oWhen the Holy Fire of §6§ojudgement§r§5§o reignites,the Light shall illuminate again,
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip8.ability: §8§oGhastly/Blazing Focus will call creatures from inferno to give you a helping hand.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip9: §0§kUntil the end of days, when all is said and done.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip9.ability: §8§oSkull Focus will summon souls from Hell.
